A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
I have to admit that i went into this film with certain expectations given the way 7 ended. I felt it was very unrewarding given that there are things you expect from star wars such as light saber duels or further explanation of the force / force use. I watched an interview with Mark Hamill saying he was surprised with Rian Johnson's take on Luke Skywalker\, and I have to agree. I had such hope that with this being the longest SW movie we would be introduced to a new depth of the force. Not only did they fail to do that\, but i felt that this movie as a whole failed to convey any depth at all\, for any character. All in all i feel that disney was overly involved or Rian Johnson was a poor choice as a director. 


***spoiler alert**** 



Yoda was the high light
